properties.name: Bognor Marsh Management Area
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere are two boxes planted here. i. Soaring With Turkeys is on top of the escarpment and ii. Singing With Blackbirds is on the marsh boardwalk. Planted summer 2007.

properties.name: Bruce's Caves
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one box hidden here at this Conservation Area. (Will notify when planted).

properties.name: Centennial Tower
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one letterbox hidden in this vicinity. (will notify when planted)

properties.name: Harrison Park
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoA lovely spot in the centre of Owen Sound. There are two boxes here. i. Sanctuary is hidden in the woods near the bird/waterfowl sanctuary. ii. Underground Terminus is hidden within view of the memorial commemorating the terminus of the Underground Railroad in Owen Sound. Planted summer 2007.

properties.name: Hope Bay Forest
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoÂ There is one box hidden here in this Provincial Forest Reserve. (Will notify when planted).

properties.name: Indian Falls
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one letterbox hidden in this conservation area. (will notify when hidden).

properties.name: Inglis Falls
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one letterbox hidden here, near the falls. (will notify when planted)

properties.name: Kemble Mountain Lookout
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoA great view. There is one letterbox hidden here. (will notify when planted).

properties.name: Lion's Head
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one box hidden here. There is a lovely lookout south toward the "lion\'s head", although it only appears a lion\'s head from the south and from out in the lake proper. (will notify when planted).

properties.name: Potawattomi Conservation Area
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoJones Falls ~ This lovely little falls can be seen from Hwy. 6 just west of Owen Sound. Park at the Information Centre on the east side of Hwy. 6 just north of where the highway turns at Springmount.

properties.name: Purple Valley
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one box hidden here, with a gorgeous outlook over the bay south. (will notify when planted).

properties.name: Slough of Despond
properties.description: Posted by Gwendellanno

properties.name: Spey River Management Area
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoAn old homestead, the area has now been turned into a skiing and mountain biking area. There is one letterbox hidden here. Planted fall 2007.

properties.name: Spirit Rock
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one box here, celebrating both the skeleton of the Corran and the "ghost" of the indian maiden who threw herself over the cliffs here. (will notify when planted).

properties.name: The Glen Management Area
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one letterbox hidden in this conservation area accessed from Grey Rd. 17. (will notify when planted).

properties.name: Wiarton Willie
properties.description: Posted by GwendellannoThere is one box hidden here near the statue of Wiarton Willie. Planted spring 2007.
